sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with lan xian feng yan 爛弦風眼 , festering [eyelid] rim with wind eye. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry yang 羊 quotes Yi jian zhi 夷堅志 : 二百味草花膏，治爛弦風赤眼 , “The paste with the 200 herbal flowers cures festering [eyelid] rim with wind red eyes ”.
